Plot: A young ninja turns his back on the orphanage that raised him, leading to a confrontation with a fellow ninja from the clan.
Title: Ninja Assassin
Writer: Matthew Sand (screenplay), J. Michael Straczynski (screenplay), Matthew Sand (story)
Actors: Rain, Joon Lee, Jonathan Chan-Pensley, Ill-Young Kim
tomatoConsensus: Overly serious and incomprehensibly edited, Ninja Assassin fails to live up to the promise of its title.
